patthana15.84:1.1: Saraṇaṃ micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.84:2.1: Araṇaṃ sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.84:3.1: Araṇaṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaraṇo naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasaraṇo naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
